activities: Clearvale provides a platform ("Clearvale Platform") that enables users to create, join or browse social networks built on Clearvale. Clearvale may use users personal information to operate, provide, improve, and maintain the Clearvale Platform, and our other services and systems, and to develop new products and services;to prevent abusive and fraudulent use of the Clearvale Platform and our other services and systems;  to send users administrative messages, and information about Networks, content, and Clearvale services that users may be interested in; and for other administrative and internal business purposes. When users contact BroadVision, we may keep a record of users communication to help solve any issues users might be facing. BroadVision use information collected from cookies to improve users experience and the overall quality of our services. For example, by saving users language preferences, Clearvale will be able to have our services appear in the language users perfer. Also we will ask for users consent before using information for a purpose other than those that are set out in our Privacy Policy. Furthermore, the Clearvale Platform processes personal information on our servers in many countries around the world. We may process users personal information on a server located outside the country where uses live.

recoursemech: BroadVision has retained TRUSTe as an independent recourse mechanism since 2010. If users are not satisfied with BroadVision's response, users can resort to Truste Watchdog Dispute Resolution for their complaints.
